channel.title: The Velvethead Lounge ::: deep and funky house
channel.description:
The Velvethead Lounge is a podcast produced by DJ Joel Antipuesto in San Francisco. Presenting his favorite deep and funky house tracks, these DJ mixes will feed your body and soul, and hopefully inspire you to move and groove.
A phrase coined by a friend to describe the texture of his shaved head, DJ Joel has since taken the term velvethead to describe the smooth and luxurious musical space that deep and funky house music provides. Velvethead is a state of mind.
An archive of older episodes (before 2009) can be found at: www.mixcrate.com/velvetheadlounge.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Deep and funky house music from DJ Joel Antipuesto in San Francisco
channel.itunes:author: Joel Antipuesto
channel.itunes:summary:
The Velvethead Lounge is a podcast produced by DJ Joel Antipuesto in San Francisco. Presenting his favorite deep and funky house tracks, these DJ mixes will feed your body and soul, and hopefully inspire you to move and groove.
A phrase coined by a friend to describe the texture of his shaved head, DJ Joel has since taken the term velvethead to describe the smooth and luxurious musical space that deep and funky house music provides. Velvethead is a state of mind.
An archive of older episodes (before 2009) can be found at: www.mixcrate.com/velvetheadlounge.

item.title: Weekend ::: 4sep2011
item.description:
Some beats for the weekend...

Also, I wanted to take a moment to remember and celebrate. Since the last episode, we lost the great Amy Winehouse. With only two albums to her body of work, she left too soon, but her seminal Back to Black will always be a favorite of mine. The remix of "Stronger Than Me" (from the her first album, Frank) by Da Sunlounge & Inland Knights is included in this episode. Also included is a funky track by Kinky Movement sampling "Blood On The Dance Floor" by Michael Jackson, whose 53rd birthday would have been August 29. 

 

[track - artist - label]

Got My Number - Kinky Movement vs. Michael Jackson - Re-edit Recordings

Alicia's Groove - Scott Diaz - connectd 

Turn Me - Robert Boogert - Drop Music

No Diggity - Unknown vs. Blackstreet - Gooch

Boom - Asad Rizvi - Drop Music

Gonna Give It To Ya - Frankie J vs. Mary Jane Girls - Flapjack

Girl In the Window - Inland Knights - Drop Music

Rollin' In The Beat - Tim Nobody and Big Joe Hix vs. Adele - Coyote Cuts

Inverted Coma - Giom - Drop Music

All Nations (Soledrifter Vocal Dub) - Christian Alvarez feat. Mr. V - Salted Music

Something For The Weekend (Joey Negro Z Mix) - Ben Westbeech - Strictly Rhythm

Everybody (Aki's Formant Experience Vocal Mix) - Miguel Migs feat. Evelyn "Champagne" King - Salted Music

Come Together - Andy Ward and Random Soul - Random Soul Recordings

Track A - Da Sunlounge and Inland Knights vs. Amy Winehouse - Borrowed

Fly Life - Basement Jaxx - Atlantic Jaxx Recordings

 

 

Please support these artists and labels. Keep house music alive!

item.title: Sky High ::: 4july2011
item.description:
Back to The Velvethead Lounge after a short break. Just in time for heat and fireworks. Here are some cool tracks for your hot summer nights.

 

[track - artist - label]

Funky Like That (Random Soul Vocal Mix) - Dave Mayer - Strictly Rhythm

Blame The Boogie (Rescue Remix) - Silent Partner - Bump Shop Music

Over Me - South of Roosevelt - Guesthouse

Enjoy The Ride (James Talk and Ridney Remix) - Roy Davis Jr. feat. J Noize and Kaye Fox - Defected

Wanna Dance? (2011 Fox Mix) - Joshua Heath - Golden State

Golden (Sonny Fodera Remix) - Will Jax - Beatdown

Bass. Drums. Harmony. (RSR Deep Wash) - Yogi and Husky - Salted

Love Light Flight (Uriah West Remix) - Silent Partner - Bump Shop Music

For Your Love 2011 - Chocolate Puma feat. Colonel Red - Defected

Soul Heaven - The Goodfellas - Azuli

Love Alive (D'Flower Remix) - Jay-J feat. Charlene Moore - Shifted

Want You In My Soul - Lovebirds feat. Stee Downes - Winding Road

Finally (MAW Cosmic Dub Mix) - Kings of Tomorrow - Defected

 

 

Please support these artists and labels. Keep house music alive!

item.title: Love Sensation ::: 3april2011
item.description:
Spring awakening. Time for a love sensation. A special dedication to Loleatta Holloway, the soulful diva who the world lost on March 21, 2011.

 

[track - artist - label]

Shakin' It Up (Main Mix) - Phil Asher and The Mighty Zaf feat. Zansika - Restless Soul

4 You (Maya Jane Coles Remix) - 4th Measure Men - Defected

Try Again - Aaliyah vs. Kinky Movement - Replay

It's Just Begun - Robert Gaez and  Ruben Alvarez feat. Darren J. Bell - Defected

Gotta Hold On Me (That Skatt Thing) (Gramophonedzie Nuskool Remix) - The Muthafunkaz - Code Red

At The Club (Timmy Regisford and Adam Rios Remix) - Timmy Regisford feat. Lynn Lockamy - Tribe

Turn Me On - The House Inspectors - Kinjo

Runaway (Mousse T's Jazz Funk Experience) - Nuyorican Soul feat. India - Giant Step

Love Sensation (Freemasons Mix) - Loleatta Halloway - Salsoul

Brand New Groove - Celeda and Honey Dijon - Mile End Records

Weekend Lovers - Anhanguera feat. J-Dub - Guesthouse

Monday - Will Power - Flapjack Records

You Got Me - Intruder - MURK 

 

Please support these artists and labels. Keep house music alive!

item.title: Ready ::: 18sept2010
item.description:
Are you ready to receive the joys that life has to offer? It starts with me. It starts with you. Peace, love and understanding.

item.title: Kinetic ::: 31mar2010
item.description: Kinteic energy is the extra energy an object possesses due to its motion. It is the work needed to accelerate a body from rest into its current velocity. [ Track - Artist - Label ] Here I Am Baby (Joshua Mix) - Gene Farris - Alphabet Music TEXTYA (Chachalekpafun) (Club Mix) - Phil Asher feat SPRY - Restless Soul Music Planet Sax (DJ Spen Remix) - Aaron Ross - Code Red Don't Leave Me (Ron Carroll Vocal Mix) - Kathy Brown - MN2S Secret (DJ Spen and Irvin Madden Remix) - Yass feat. Kinteic energy is the extra energy an object possesses due to its motion. It is the work needed to accelerate a body from rest into its current velocity.

item.title: Motion ::: 24jan2010
item.description:
"All the heaven's in the motion..."

Happy New Year! I hope the start of the new year and new decade finds you happy and well. This month's mix includes a favorite, Dennis Ferrer's "Hey Hey". It's been hyped by everyone the past few months and for good reason. I end the set with a tribute to the late Teddy Pendergrass who passed away on January 13. As lead singer for Harold Melvin and The Blue Notes and as a solo artist, his soulful voice glided over classics like "Wake Up Everybody" and "The Love I Lost". R.I.P. Teddy.

[ track - artist - label ]

World In My Eyes (Oil Tank Mix) - Depeche Mode - Mute

Hey Hey - Dennis Ferrer - Objektivity

Jesus Creates Sound - Marlon D - Strictly Rhythm

Gone (The Wizard Brian Cox Original Mix) - Yasmeen - Strictly Rhythm

Don't Tell Me You're Sorry (Jay-J's Margic Sessions 96 Tribute) - Ethan White and Marie Tweek - Large

Forgive Me Now (AC's Reconstruction Mix) - IreneB - Wall Shaker Music

Pretty (Mark Grant Mix) - Heather Johnson - King Street

Nervous Track (M's Re-Play) - Soul Purpose - Soul Purpose

Now I Know (Scott Wozniak Club Mix) - Scott Wozniak feat. Ambrosia

Runaway (Spanish Underground Mix) - Nuyorican Soul - Giant Step

Don't Leave Me This Way (Dmitri from Paris' Edit) - Harold Melvin and The Blue Notes - Philly International

Please support these artists and labels. Keep house music alive!

item.title: Life is Beautiful: 20dec2009
item.description:
Happy Holidays! As we come to the end of the year and the decade, I hope that all is well with you. Although there may be challenges still left to face, life is beautiful and there's much to celebrate. This month's mix features some recent remixes of some classic tracks, including Hardrive's "Deep Inside", Deep Zone's "It's Gonna Be Alright", and King Unique's "Love is What You Need". I've also include some old favorites: DJ Spen's take on Mary J Blige's "Beautiful" and the MK dub of Jodeci's "Freek-n-You".

[ Track - Artist - Label ]

I Can Sing - Mr. V - SOLE Channel

Back In The Day (Panevino Remix) - Dutchian Soul feat. Andrea Love - Panevino Music

Deep Inside (Jesse Rose Play Late Mix) - Hardrive - Strictly Rhythm

Worry - YSE feat. Beckford - Lost My Dog

Be Thankful (Andy Tee Deep Space Mix) - B.A.D. Connection - Purple Music

The Better Life (Restless Soul Vocal Mix) - George Levin - BBE

Only Love Can Take Control - Jovinn vs. Chocolate Puma feat. Shermanology - Defected

In Time (Richard Earnshaw Vocal Mix) - Andy Compton feat. Diviniti - SHE Recordings

Take What You Want (DPC's Lawnchair Generals Mix) - Dave Miller feat. Kally Hayden - Motion Music

My Cabaret - Velvethead vs. IO vs. Quentin Harris feat. Margaret Grace

Beautiful (DJ Spen Mix) - Mary J Blige - white

Valley of The Lost Souls (Asad's Silverlining Dub) - Asad Rizvi and Ingrid Hakanson - Nite Grooves

Enjoy Music - Reboot - Defected

Souls of Yoruba (Shlomi Aber's Chicago Delight Mix) - Gel Abril - Defected

That Feeling (Chris Soul NY Mix) - DJ Chus Presents The Groove Foundation - Defected

Freek-n-You (MK Dub) - Jodeci - MCA

Who Dares To Believe In Me (Martijn Ten Veldden Remix) - The Believers - Strictly Rhythm

It's Gonna Be Alright (Matty's 15 Year Anniversary Mix) - Deep Zone feat Ceybil Jeffries - Defected

Love Is What You Need (Look Ahead) (Ralf Gum Vocal) - King Unique - Defected

Life is Good (Louis Benedetti Club Vox) - Louis Benedetti and Andricka Hall - Soulshine

Send For Me (David Harness and Chris Lum Mix) - Atlantic Starr

Support these artists and labels. Keep house music alive!
